thread.title: Stubble Offers Fans Tickets to TIDALX 10:20 With You're In Contest
thread.title_full: Stubble Offers Fans Tickets to TIDALX 10:20 With You're In Contest

title: Stubble Offers Fans Tickets to TIDALX 10:20 With You're In Contest
text: Stubble Offers Fans Tickets to TIDALX 10:20 With You're In Contest October 15,   Brooklyn, New York - Stubblr, the new mobile ticket marketplace, delights fans with "You're In" event giveaway series sending two winners to TIDALX 10:20 concert featuring Beyonce, Jay-Z, Nicki Minaj and Usher at Barclays Center Oct 20th. Stubblr, the new, fan-first is empowering sports, concert and theater ticketing app is rewarding early-adopters with "You're In!", a premiere event giveaway series. Stubblr, a location-based mobile ticket marketplace, is celebrating its launch in the App Store with a series of giveaways including tickets to the Mets NLDS playoffs at Citi Field, and premiere seats at the upcoming TIDALX 10:20 concert October 20th at Barclays Center, featuring Beyonce, Jay-Z, Nicki Minaj, Usher and more. Stubblr's first "You're In!" winner, Kyle Boris of NJ, was awarded tickets to last-Monday night's coveted NY Mets NLDS faceoff with the LA Dodgers at CitiField. Tickets were presented by Stubblr Co-Founders Paul Yankowitz and Steven Rosenberg. Said Yankowitz: "We've been thrilled that fans are embracing Stubblr as the new, fast and fair way to find, buy and sell tickets. As avid sports and concert-goers, Steve and I wanted to reward new users with special opportunities to attend some of the most sought-after events coming up this Fall." To enter, fans simply download Stubblr's free app and post a request for their desired contest event - no purchase necessary. Upcoming Stubblr "You're In" opportunities include: October 20th: TIDALX 10:20"We've been thrilled that fans are embracing Stubblr as the new, fast and fair way to find, buy and sell tickets. As avid sports and concert-goers, Steve and I wanted to reward new users with special opportunities to attend some of the most sought-after events coming up this Fall." explained Paul Yankowitz, Founder, Stubblr. Broadway fans with a new mobile ticketing app that transforms the way users find, buy and sell and tickets. The Stubblr app for iOS combines geo-location and social components to help fans safely and easily find buyers and sellers of last-minute tickets near their location, in real-time. The game-changing, mobile-first app is made by fans, for fans. Stubblr was developed by avid sports and live music fans, Co-Founders Steven Rosenberg and Paul Yankowitz. Rosenberg said: "Paul and IWe were tired of the practices and limitations of online ticketing platforms and having to deal with scalpers. We knew there had to be a better way, and thought we could combine the immediacy and transparency of apps like Uber and Airbnb to create a mobile-first ticketing platform." Yankowitz added: "Our vision for Stubblr is to tear down the barriers established by traditional marketplaces, and create a safe environment that empowers buyers and sellers to transact directly in real-time." Users are already embracing the new approach, awarding Stubblr with dozens of 5-star reviews in the App store. Stubblr Features: * Post ticket requests and deals * Find buyers and sellers around you with geo location * Instantly chat with users to negotiate and transact * Social profiles for verification * Digital payments and buyer ticket validation   7.0 or later * 15.4
